directives.name: wired
directives.description: Injects the necessary client-side scripts for Wired.

elements.name: template
elements.description: Standard HTML template element, heavily used by Alpine.js for x-for and x-if directives.

x-for.comment: Iterates over an array or object. Must be used on a <template> tag.

x-if.comment: Conditionally renders content. Must be used on a <template> tag.

wire:click.comment: Handles click events and calls a component method.

wire:model.comment: Two-way data binding for component properties.

wire:keyup.comment:
Listens for keyup events.

### Example
```html
<input wire:keyup.escape="cancel" />
```

wire:mouseenter.comment: Triggers action when mouse enters the element.

wire:mouseleave.comment: Triggers action when mouse leaves the element.

wire:init.comment: Runs an action immediately after the component initializes.

wire:loading.comment: Toggles visibility or classes while a network request is pending.

wire:target.comment: Scopes loading indicators to a specific method or model.

wire:poll.comment: Polls the server at a specified interval.

wire:ignore.comment: Tells Kirewire to ignore this element and its children during DOM updates.

wire:key.comment: Assigns a unique key to an element for diffing.

wire:id.comment: Internal ID of the component instance (auto-generated).

wire:confirm.comment: Prompts the user for confirmation before an action.

wire:stream.comment: Enables streaming updates for this element (if supported by the backend response).

wire:offline.comment:
Toggles visibility or classes when the browser goes offline. ### Modifiers - `.class`: Adds a class when offline - `.attr`: Adds an attribute when offline - `.remove`: Hides when offline ### Example ```html
You are currently offline.
```

wire:dirty.comment: Toggles visibility or classes when the component state is "dirty" (unsaved changes). Usually used with `wire:model`. ### Modifiers - `.class`: Adds a class when dirty - `.attr`: Adds an attribute when dirty - `.remove`: Hides when dirty ### Example ```html Unsaved changes... ```

x-data.comment: Declares a new Alpine component scope.

x-init.comment: Runs code when an element is initialized.

x-show.comment: Toggles the visibility of an element.

x-bind.comment: Sets the value of an attribute.

x-on.comment: Attaches an event listener to the element.

x-text.comment: Updates the text content of an element.

x-html.comment: Updates the inner HTML of an element.

x-model.comment: Adds two-way data binding to an element.

x-for.comment: Iterates over an array or object. Must be used on a <template> tag.

x-transition.comment: Applies enter and leave transitions to an element.

x-effect.comment: Executes a script each time one of its dependencies changes.

x-ignore.comment: Prevents Alpine from initializing attributes within the element.

x-ref.comment: References an element directly by name.

x-cloak.comment: Hides the element until Alpine has initialized.

x-teleport.comment: Teleports the element to another part of the DOM.

x-if.comment: Conditionally renders an element. Must be used on a <template> tag.

x-id.comment: Generates a unique ID for accessible elements.

wire:submit.prevent.comment: Handles form submission and prevents default behavior.

wire:loading.class.comment: Adds a class while a network request is pending.

wire:loading.attr.comment: Adds an attribute while a network request is pending.
